Name: Verify Successful Checkout from Home Page with New iPhone 15 Plus
Description: Navigate to the home page, add a new iPhone 15 Plus to the cart, proceed to checkout, enter payment details, and complete the order. Verify return to the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item phone
Step 3: Click on link apple2
Step 4: Click on button addToCartNewiPhone15Plus
Step 5: Click on label 256Gb2
Step 6: Click on label pink
Step 7: Click on button buy2
Step 8: Click on link cartHeaderActive -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 9: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
Step 10: Click on button completeOrder -> Navigate to page ''
Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
